Reviews.Title: Good, for the price
Reviews.Author: Nona
Reviews.Content: Didn't feel like getting a more expensive tablet so I went for this one.. It can be fairly slow, and the headphone jack doesn't really work well. Still good value. If you want amazing performance, save up for a more expensive model. This is functional and has enough features(Android Jellybean, Google Play Store, 2 cameras, etc) to be worth the money though. The size is good because it's in between the usual 7 and 10 inch sizes, but I'm still debating opting for a better(albeit pricier) device. It's decent though, especially for kids.

Reviews.Title: sd card slot failed
Reviews.Author: James Krause
Reviews.Content: The tablet worked fine except the micro sd card slot would not let a micro card seat properly so that you could not use a microcard to increase the GB available to store apps ,etc, The vendor, outlet pc, had great customer service and I was able to return the item and get my refund. Nice people there.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Danny Nisenoff
Reviews.Content: tablet is good, but not as fast as they made it out to be. Most apps can be downloaded to it.
